org.opengrok.indexer.framework

Class PluginFramework<PluginType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.framework.PluginFramework<PluginType>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthorizationFramework

    public abstract class PluginFramework<PluginType>
extends Object
    Plugin framework for plugins of type PluginType.
    Author:
    Krystof Tulinger

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PluginFramework(Class<PluginType> classType, String path)
      Create a new instance of plugin framework for a plugin directory.

      • getClassName

        protected String getClassName(IAuthorizationPlugin plugin)
        Return the java canonical name for the plugin class. If the canonical name does not exist it returns the usual java name.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the plugin
        Returns:
        the class name

      • handleLoadClass

        public PluginType handleLoadClass(String classname)
        Wrapper around the class loading. Report all exceptions into the log.
        Parameters:
        classname - full name of the class
        Returns:
        the class implementing the IAuthorizationPlugin interface or null if there is no such class
        See Also:
        loadClass(String)

      • getSuperclassesAndInterfaces

        protected List<Class> getSuperclassesAndInterfaces(Class clazz)
        Get all available interfaces or superclasses of a class clazz.
        Parameters:
        clazz - class
        Returns:
        list of interfaces or superclasses of the class clazz

      • classLoaded

        protected abstract void classLoaded(PluginType plugin)
        Allow the implementing class to interact with the loaded class when the class was loaded with the custom class loader.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the loaded plugin

      • beforeReload

        protected abstract void beforeReload()
        Perform custom operations before the plugins are loaded.

      • afterReload

        protected abstract void afterReload()
        Perform custom operations when the framework has reloaded all available plugins.

        When this is invoked, all plugins has been loaded into the memory and for each available plugin the classLoaded(Object) was invoked.

      • reload

        public final void reload()
        Calling this function forces the framework to reload the plugins.

        Plugins are taken from the pluginDirectory.
